data.prayer: Please, convict the 123,234 believers in Ouest, Cameroon to look to you as their only hope for strength and fruitfulness and life.
data.verse: "I am the vine; you are the branches. If you remain in me and I in you, you will bear much fruit; apart from me you can do nothing.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Ouest, Cameroon
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, please send new evangelists into the harvest in the state of Ouest, Cameroon.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 10 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, please give the church in the state of Ouest prophets who can build up holiness and faithfulness to you.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, help the 123,234 believers in Ouest to know your commands and to do them.
data.verse: For Ezra had devoted himself to the study and observance of the Law of the Lord, and to teaching its decrees and laws in Israel.

data.prayer: Father, we cry out for a prayer movement in the state of Ouest, Cameroon. Please, stir the 123,234 believers here to pray for awakening.
Father, for those with enemies and who are afraid in Ouest, call them into your shelter and safety today.
data.verse: For you have been a refuge for me, a strong tower from the enemy.

data.prayer: Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the state of Ouest, Cameroon.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.
